type:{{item.type}} import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Link, LinkService} from "../services/link/link.service"; import {StorageService} from "../services/storage/storage.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-tab2', templateUrl: 'tab2.page.html', styleUrls: ['tab2.page.scss'] }) export class Tab2Page { links: Link[] = []; constructor( private linkService: LinkService, private storageService: StorageService ) { this.linkService.links$.subscribe(links => { this.links = links; }) } /* private initLinks() { this.linkService.links$.subscribe(links => { this.listData$ = []; links.forEach(link => { this.listData$.push(of(link)); }); }); }*/ openJoke(link: Link){ this.linkService.linkDetail = link; } async removeLink(index:any){ await this.linkService.removeLink(index); } }
